publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7758 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Scotland’s Michelin Stars—That the Parliament congratulates the top-rated Scottish restaurants that have retained their Michelin stars in the latest edition of the world-renowned food guide; believes that The Kitchin, Restaurant Martin Wishart and Plumed Horse all fly the flag for quality cuisine in Leith and Edinburgh; notes that the Michelin star awards are recognised worldwide, and believes that such recognition brings with it important business, economic and tourism opportunities for the city.

S3M-7758 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Scotland’s Michelin Stars—That the Parliament congratulates the top-rated Scottish restaurants that have retained their Michelin stars in the latest edition of the world-renowned food guide; believes that The Kitchin, Restaurant Martin Wishart and Plumed Horse all fly the flag for quality cuisine in Leith and Edinburgh; notes that the Michelin star awards are recognised worldwide, and believes that such recognition brings with it important business, economic and tourism opportunities for the city.
S3M-7758 Scotland’s Michelin Stars (lodged on 20 January 2011) Bill Kidd*, Ian McKee*, Aileen Campbell*, Sandra White*, Robin Harper*
S3M-7758 Scotland’s Michelin Stars (lodged on 20 January 2011) Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-7758 Scotland’s Michelin Stars (lodged on 20 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*, Sarah Boyack*
